item.title: Resume
item.description: Table of Contents Highlights Open Source contributions on GitHub Senior Cloud Architect (IT-04) at Statistics Canada Senior Drupal Technical Architect (IT-03) at Statistics Canada Presentations Education Honors, Bachelor of Computer Science, Carleton University Game Development, Algonquin College Language Proficiency Security Clearance Work Statistics Canada [2019-11 to Present] Cloud Native Solutions [2018-06 to 2019-11] Enterprise Cloud Services [2015-03 to 2018-06] Web Content Management [2011-06 to 2015-03] Web Content Management Open Plus [2011-03 to Present] Senior Developer Open Source [2013-09 to Present] Open Source Developer Awards Excellence in Service Delivery Award Employee Recognition Award Public Service Excellence Award Team of the Year Award GTEC Winner GTEC Honoree Merit Award A+ Certified Professional References Highlights Open Source contributions on GitHub canada-ca-terraform-modules Managed MySQL Flexible Server Managed PostgreSQL Flexible Server statcan Advanced Analytics Workspaces AAW Kubeflow Containers AAW Kubeflow Manifests GateKeeper Policies Charts Argo Controller wxt Drupal WxT Composer Project for Drupal WxT Helm for DrupalWxT Senior Cloud Architect (IT-04) at Statistics Canada Managed diverse Kubernetes clusters across the entire Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) Currently 3+ years, including critical business workloads running on production clusters.
